page.title: 07Jobs in the Horton area.
page.content: In Horton most of the employment is in farming.Most people go outside Horton to work,probably commuting to Bristol. Some jobs are created by Chipping Sodbury Quarry.But most of these jobs go to people from outside the area. Horton has a post office,one lady works at the post office.Most people who live in the Horton area have come from outside places,and have bought a house.Some people are employed by the Golf Club,but not many .The shop we went in sold 250 units of farm machinery nationwide a year (approx). They don't sell a lot of lawnmowers, when they do it is a mixture of well known makes.They employ 31 people. So it is quite hard to get a job in Horton.
